resources.string: Welcome to Pattern Response. In this game, players must memorize a musical pattern and replay the notes by pressing their respective symbols located at the bottom of the screen. If a player succedes, they must then play an additional note to add to the pattern. If a player fails, they lose the game. The first player to play 16 notes wins.
Press the bottom left corner of the screen to play against the computer. Press the bottom right corner of the screen to play against another person instead.
Memorize this pattern and replay it exactly as is, with one additional note afterwards:
